Add comprehensive patent network data analysis infrastructure

This commit establishes the foundational documentation and analysis scripts for the patent co-ownership network dataset.

Data Documentation:
- Created detailed documentation for db_networkCoPat_fake.rds \(137,990 patent relationships\)
- Documented all 6 data columns with types, statistics, and distributions
- Verified data quality: 100% different owner pairs, 99.15% cross-border relationships
- Clarified network structure: undirected graph with weighted edges \(1-14\)
- Added analysis of temporal distribution \(2010-2018\) and geographic coverage \(96 countries\)

Analysis Scripts:
- explore_rds.py: Exploratory data analysis with comprehensive statistics
- verify_data.py: Data verification and quality assurance checks
- scripts/README.md: Complete documentation of all analysis tools

Key Insights:
- 134,455-134,468 unique patent owners
- Strongly international network \(99.15% cross-border connections\)
- Balanced temporal distribution across 9 years
- Right-skewed weight distribution \(median: 4.0, mean: 3.91\)
